Text: The World I Know:  Written by lead singer and guitarist Ed Roland and guitarist Ross Childress, "The World I Know" peaked at #19 on the "Billboard" Hot 100 chart when released as a single, and spent four weeks at the #1 spot on the "Billboard" Hot Mainstream Rock Tracks chart.
